LoginManager - Class in de.db.derPate.manager
This class is used to read and write login data (see LoginUser) to the client's HttpSession.

Default constructor used for initializing attributes.
LoginServlet - Class in de.db.derPate.servlet
This servlet get's called by the client, when the user tries to log on.

loginToken - Variable in class de.db.derPate.model.Trainee
 
LoginUser - Class in de.db.derPate.model
Baseclass of all classes, that can store data, which you can use to log on.

logout(HttpSession) - Method in class de.db.derPate.manager.LoginManager
Removes connection between HttpSession and LoginUser
LogoutServlet - Class in de.db.derPate.servlet
This servlet is used to remove the relation between the client's HttpSession and the logged in LoginUser.
